decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): 01 SITE LOCATION PLAN; 02 EXISTING SITE PLAN; 03 EXISTING DRAWING; 04 PROPOSED DRAWING; 06 PROPOSED SITE PLAN; PLANNING STATEMENT
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), and the Ealing Local Plan (Reg 19) (2024).
description: Replacement and extension of external render finish to gable wall; and installation of roof parapet concrete coping stones
